Admin.title: Control center
Admin.subtitle: Next.js admin skeleton with fast libraries: React Query, React Hook Form, Zod, DaisyUI, and shadcn/ui.
Admin.quickActionsDescription: Most common flows for RusToK admins.

quickActions.title: New catalog
quickActions.description: Add a category to the storefront

Users.title: Users
Users.subtitle: Single page, two API formats: REST /api/auth/me and GraphQL users.

access.title: Access configuration
access.description: Requests use ADMIN_API_TOKEN and ADMIN_TENANT_SLUG environment variables.
access.restHint: Bearer token is required, otherwise /api/auth/me returns 401.
access.graphqlHint: Requires users:list permissions and a valid tenant slug.

rest.title: REST: /api/auth/me
rest.subtitle: Current user from the REST layer.

graphql.title: GraphQL: users
graphql.subtitle: User list from the GraphQL layer.
